column4: how can i place a short cut to a folder in the main window in ubuntu?
how can i place a short cut to a folder in the main window in ubuntu?
how can i place a short cut to a folder in the main window in ubuntu? how can i change the wallpaper using a jpg file i downloaded from internet?
to change wallpaper: right click in desktop->change background (something like that) then you can "add" new images to the set of available wallpapers.
